public class TopicController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • addTopic

        @PostMapping(value="/api/addTopic")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addTopic(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                             FrontEndTopic fe)
        Adds specified Topic. Id is unnecessary. Returns "success" or "failure."
        Parameters:
        session - No need to provide.
        fe - The frontend wrapper for the Topic requesting to be created.
        Returns:
        "success" or "failure"

      • getTopics

        @GetMapping(value="/api/getTopics")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<FrontEndTopic> getTopics(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Returns all Topics in the requested group. Returns empty list of user is not part of group.
        Parameters:
        session - No need to provide.
        Returns:
        Topics in the requested group.

      • deleteTopic

        @PostMapping(value="/api/deleteTopic")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteTopic(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                   @RequestParam
                                                                                                   int TopicId)
        Delete an Topic by its ID
        Parameters:
        session - Session
        TopicId - Topic ID
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 if successful, HTTP 500 otherwise

      • updateTopic

        @PostMapping(value="/api/updateTopic")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateTopic(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                   @RequestParam
                                                                                                   FrontEndTopic Topic)
        Update an Topic that already exists
        Parameters:
        session - Session
        Topic - Front end Topic with updates made
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 if successful, HTTP 500 otherwise

      • getTopicsForUser

        @GetMapping(value="/api/getTopicsForUser")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<FrontEndTopic> getTopicsForUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Returns a list of Topics for a given user id
        Parameters:
        session - Session
        Returns:
        List of Topics for user with given ID

      • getTopicFeedback

        @GetMapping(value="/api/getTopicFeedback")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<FrontEndPost> getTopicFeedback(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam
                                                                                                                 int TopicId)
        Gets comments for an Topic
        Parameters:
        session - Session
        TopicId - ID of Topic to get comments for
        Returns:
        List of comments for Topic. No particular ordering.

      • createPost

        @PostMapping(value="/api/createPost")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam
                                                                                                 int TopicId,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="-1")
                                                                                                 int parentId,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam
                                                                                                 java.lang.String comment,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam
                                                                                                 boolean isPrivate)
        Post a comment about an Topic
        Parameters:
        session - Session
        TopicId - ID of Topic to comment on
        parentId - Parent of comment (use to create sub-comments)
        comment - Text of comment
        isPrivate - Specifies if this comment is private
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 if successful, HTTP 500 otherwise
